Top Ability Rules: Summon a plant that is 5 feet wide and up to X feet long or tall. It lasts until you cast Nuture Nature again
Bottom Ability Rules: Create 1 foot thick wall, X+Y tall and wide, up to X feet away
General Notes: maybe we add more no-sight cards, but it could be op

Top Ability Rules: Target is revived from downed state, their health is up to X
Bottom Ability Rules: X are targeted, healed by Y amount. Exhaust a card from your hand, deck, or discard pile.
General Notes: we have a LOT of 'statis' cards...

Top Ability Rules: Return card from discard after attack
Bottom Ability Rules: Return 3 cards from discard

Top Ability Rules: You may move a token from one target to another
Bottom Ability Rules: Add X to attack value

Top Ability Rules: Topple if damage is dealt
Bottom Ability Rules: For each attack made against you, immediately after attack that enemy

Top Ability Rules: On success, targets next roll of any kind is reduced by X
Bottom Ability Rules: Target adds X to next attack or defense value

Top Ability Rules: If marked, add X to attack value, then remove a mark from target
Bottom Ability Rules: Mark target if damage is dealt

Top Ability Rules: Transform into similar-sized creature. Add X to defense values or attack values for the duration. After duration, lose Y in Health Points
Bottom Ability Rules:
Summon either: 
A plant [all die=your influence die, range 5ft, health=X, no movement]
A creature [attack die=your attack die, defense=Y, range 5ft, health=Y, movement=your movement]

Top Ability Rules: Attack target up to X times, and lose X health per attack
Bottom Ability Rules: Lose X health points. Increase all defense values by X

Top Ability Rules: Heal target by X
Bottom Ability Rules: Target returns 1 card from discard

Top Ability Rules: Increase range by 5 feet and movement by 15 feet
Bottom Ability Rules: Attack target twice, lose 15 feet of movement

Top Ability Rules: Add X to next defense value
Bottom Ability Rules: If next defense value is greater than opposing attack value, attacker takes difference in damage

Top Ability Rules: Add X to the next influence roll. Choose 1: add 25 movement, or return a target card from discard
Bottom Ability Rules: Either add X to next Attack Value or add X to your next Defense Value.

Top Ability Rules: At a range of X*5 feet, create a 15 ft diameter smoke screen. Applies No Sight to any creature within
Bottom Ability Rules: On success, target cannot target you with more than one action on their turn

Top Ability Rules: On success, target is forced to perform 1 specific 6-second duration non-violent action on their next turn, up to GM discretion
Bottom Ability Rules: On success, discard a card and gain knowledge of enemies actions

Top Ability Rules: If target bares one of your Attack Tokens, you may remove the token and attack the target again.
Bottom Ability Rules: Return X consumed tokens

Top Ability Rules: If marked, target movement is reduced to 0, then remove a mark from the target
Bottom Ability Rules: Attack up to X targets, if damage would be dealt mark them instead

Top Ability Rules: Consume an Attack Token. Add X to your range for this turn
Bottom Ability Rules: Consume an Attack Token, add X to attack

Top Ability Rules: Target adds your Influence Die to all their Defense Values
Bottom Ability Rules: On success move all of your placed tokens onto Target Enemy

Top Ability Die Roll/Scaler: Attack    X = Attack Reduced    Y = Level
Top Ability Rules: Reduce this attack value by X, X cannot exceed Y, you may add X to your next attack value
Bottom Ability Rules: Reduce this attack value by X. If damage is still dealt then deal X twice to damage to that target
Robin's Thoughts: Wager is poor against enemies with high defense, no need to change it?

Top Ability Rules: On success, discard a card, and target cannot attack you
Bottom Ability Rules: On success, discard a card, and target must attack you with at least one action if you are in their range.

Top Ability Rules: Summon X beings with 1 health. Their defense die is a 1d4. Their Attack Value is Y. Their movement is equal to yours
Bottom Ability Rules: Summon a being with X health. Its Attack/Defense Value is 1d4 + Y. Its movement is equal to 30 ft

Top Ability Rules: Lose up to X health points, return Y cards from discard
Bottom Ability Rules: Exhaust a card, exchange a card from discard with a card from your deck, which goes into discard.

Top Ability Rules: If damage is dealt, target's next defense roll is reduced by X
Bottom Ability Rules: Recover a consumed Contact Token. if no Contact Tokens can be recovered, recover 2 cards from discard instead

Top Ability Rules: Discard X cards, heal for X+Y
Bottom Ability Rules: Discard X card, return X cards from discard

Top Ability Rules: Discard a card
Bottom Ability Rules: Attack target

Top Ability Rules: If target is marked, add X to attack value. Heal for however much damage was dealt, if any, then remove a mark
Bottom Ability Rules: If target is marked, topple target and reduce their next defense by 1d4, then remove a mark

Top Ability Rules: Add X to attack value. On damage being dealt, enemy is moved X*5 feet away from you
Bottom Ability Rules: Consume Attack Token. All targets in 5*X ft area roll Defense against the attack

Top Ability Die Roll/Scaler: X = Level  Y = coin flip/even-odd die roll
Top Ability Rules: When next attacked, first roll a die. If even, take no damage from that attack. If odd, add X to your Defense Value.
Bottom Ability Rules: If the targeted enemy attacks you before your next turrn then add X to your Defense Value

Top Ability Rules: If your attack deals damage to Target, then that Targets next Influence Roll will use a reduced die down to a minimum of a 1d4
Bottom Ability Rules: On success targets next Attack or Defense die are reduced down to a minimum 1d4.

Top Ability Rules: For next attack against you, if damage is taken, attack in response. Otherwise, return a target card from discard
Bottom Ability Rules: For next attack against you, if no damage is taken, target is toppled

Top Ability Rules: Reduce this attack value by X, if damage is still dealt then heal for X and deal X additional damage
Bottom Ability Rules: Mark Target

Top Ability Rules: All attacks against you are reduced by X. You may not attack with your other action
Bottom Ability Rules: If damage is dealt, target and targets within 5ft are marked

Top Ability Rules: Force a re-roll of target's next die roll
Bottom Ability Rules:
Choose either:
1) lowest roll of target's next action is treated as max
2) highest roll of target's next action is treated as min

Top Ability Rules: On success, target's next die rolls are rolled twice, and the lower value must be used
Bottom Ability Rules: Use a consumable. It has a 50% chance of not being consumed

Top Ability Rules: Gain  30 ft. of movement
Bottom Ability Rules: Select a direction. Select a space within 5ft of you. While active, anyone on that space may jump X ft in the selected direction

Top Ability Rules: After your attack, gain 5 ft. of movement. This movement doesn't proc Overstep
Bottom Ability Rules: Gain 1 Overstep Attack per round

Top Ability Rules:
Effects depending on X:
1-3: cause Distraction on enemy
4-6: target attacks specified enemy for 1 turn
7+: target attacks specified enemy for Y rnds
Bottom Ability Rules: Gain +1 to influence rolls

Top Ability Rules: Square terrain of size Y (up to 30ft) is harmful: any movement into, out of, or through an area results in X damage for every 5 ft.
Bottom Ability Rules: On success, target's movement is set to 0, unless they spend an action attacking their bindings

Top Ability Rules: If one of the die used for your Attack Value is less than X, you may reroll that die
Bottom Ability Rules: Lose X life.

Top Ability Rules: In response to the next Overstep Attack made against you, attack the aggressor
Bottom Ability Rules: Gain X movement before or after your attack

Top Ability Rules: If damage is dealt then return Target Card from the Discard Pile to your Hand
Bottom Ability Rules: You may reroll your attack roll, if you do then discard a card. This can be repeated up to X times.

Top Ability Rules: After attacking target, add X to your next Defense Value
Bottom Ability Rules: Add X to the Attack Value. Reduce your next Defense Value by X

Top Ability Rules: If damage would be dealt then instead Target cannot gain Health points
Bottom Ability Rules: If Attack Value is greater than or equal to double Target Defense Value then instead Target Skips their next turn and no damage is dealt

Top Ability Rules: Your arms change form but remain original size. You are treated as having applied an additional attack token to all attacked targets during duration
Bottom Ability Rules: Your flesh hardens adding X to all Defense Values

Top Ability Rules: Select an area that is 25 feet by 25 feet. Discard X cards. You may move any tokens placed on Target Enemies to other Targeted Enemies.
Bottom Ability Rules: On success you may return any amount of your tokens on Target Enemy

Top Ability Rules: Conform the space around you to encapsulate you in a shell. While in the shell you cannot see out. The shell has Y health.
Bottom Ability Rules: On success, the enemy is encapsulated in a shell. The shell has X life. While the Target is in the shell they cannot see out.

Top Ability Rules: Create an aura on you that is 15 feet in diameter. All allies in this add X to their Defense Value
Bottom Ability Rules: Create an aura on you that is 15 feet in diameter. Any enemy that walks into the aura takes X damage.

Top Ability Rules: Summon a similar sized object/creature within 5 feet of you. It has no movement. Its Health is Y and it heals for X per turn. It has no attack/defense/influence die. If you take damage instead the summon takes the damage.
Bottom Ability Rules: Summon a human sized object/creature within 5 feet of Target. The Summon has health and die equal to yours. While this Summon is active you cannot roll for Attack values.

Top Ability Rules: If an enemy moves in or out of your range, then respond with an attack
Bottom Ability Rules: If Target moves in or out of range then attack Target and add Y to the Attack Value

Top Ability Rules: On success, target cannot make any Overstep Attacks
Bottom Ability Rules: Pick an adjacent 5 ft. square. Movement through this space consumes an additional 10 ft. of movement

Top Ability Rules: Exhaust a card. Pick an adjacent 5 ft. square. The next creature entering this area takes Y damage for X rnds
Bottom Ability Rules: Pick an adjacent 5 ft. square. The next creature entering this area must make a defense roll against Y

Top Ability Die Roll/Scaler: Attack    X = Level    Y = 1/2 damage received
Top Ability Rules: If damaged in previous round, from an enemy's attack, add X & Y to attack
Bottom Ability Rules: If damage is dealt, Enemy movement is reduced by 10 ft next round

Top Ability Rules: if adjacent to ally, swap places with them. Add X to next defense or attack value
Bottom Ability Rules: if adjacent to ally, swap places with them. Heal for X
